Lets get Personal

Are you ready to make a shift? Its time to dream big.

Hey there, I'm Tricia.

A certified Conscious Uncoupling and Relationship Coach, trained and personally mentored by Katherine Woodward Thomas, the New York Times bestselling author of Conscious Uncoupling: 5 Steps to Live Happily Even After. My mission is to uplift and inspire women as they navigate the often-devastating process of ending a significant relationship. Having been through this challenging path myself, I'm here to help others channel heartbreak into a powerful opportunity for growth, supporting them in creating fulfilling lives for themselves and brighter futures for their families. From Long Island, New York, I work globally, connecting with clients from all walks of life who are ready to rebuild with intention and hope.

Where I started

Sartorial Succulents Butcher Fanny Pack Church-Key Tote Bag Bushwick Jean Shorts.

Before becoming a coach, I spent years as a professional chef, dedicated to making beautiful food and to creating warmth and connection around the table. Today, I bring that same sense of warmth and nourishment into my coaching, fostering an environment where my clients feel seen, supported, and encouraged to reach for a better, more fulfilling life. Just as a recipe can be transformed with care and the right ingredients, I believe that every woman has the potential to transform her life after loss and to rediscover her own strength, joy, and purpose.

My 5-Step Journey to Freedom and Personal Power

My approach combines a powerful fusion of intuitive and spiritual guidance with a proven, strategic 5-Step plan that can enable you to reclaim your purpose and create a life bigger and better than the one you are trying to leave behind. I’ve been where you are—on the edge of a breakthrough, yet confused and unsure of my next steps. But when I was introduced to the work of Katherine Woodward Thomas and her 5-Step process, I took a leap of faith, and that’s where my transformation began. Working closely with Katherine, I transitioned out of a toxic and unhappy marriage and stepped into my own personal power

Mindset & confidence coaching for women who are looking to create the life of their dreams.

Tricia Rago
